name: cross-tester
description: Utility for automated cross-browser testing with SauceLabs

scripts.mocha: mocha --compilers js:test/babel.js --reporter spec --ui tdd test --require babel-polyfill
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run precompile && npm run compile
scripts.prerelease: git checkout master && npm run prepublish; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'
scripts.release-patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && npm run postrelease
scripts.release-minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && npm run postrelease
scripts.release-major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && npm run postrelease
scripts.postrelease: git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
